address2: 21st Floor Tokyo Garden Terrace Kioicho 1-3 Kioicho, Chiyoda-ku
longBusinessSummary: ValueCommerce Co., Ltd. provides marketing solutions in Japan and internationally. The company develops and offers affiliate marketing services, including pay-per-performance advertising services; and Value Point Club, a cash-back program that allows users to shop top brands and earn points for purchases. It also offers STORE's R8, a CRM tool for stores in online shopping malls; Storematch, a service that provides pay-per-click Internet advertising for stores in online shopping malls and manufacturers; and B-Space, an EC operation support tool for e-commerce operators. The company was formerly known as Transpacific Inc. and changed its name to ValueCommerce Co., Ltd. in November 1999. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Tokyo, Japan. ValueCommerce Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Z Holdings Corporation.
